title: Test issue: gtk-doc
body:
Running 
```
spack install --test=root gtk-doc
```
results in the following (verbose) output - and hangs indefinitely (at least didn't finish in either failure or success for several hours)

```
==> [2021-07-05-12:59:46.976632] RUN-TESTS: build-time tests [check]
==> [2021-07-05-12:59:46.978338] 'make' '-j4' '-n' 'test'
==> [2021-07-05-12:59:46.986511] Target 'test' not found in Makefile
==> [2021-07-05-12:59:46.987353] 'make' '-j4' '-n' 'check'
==> [2021-07-05-12:59:47.074653] 'make' '-j4' 'check'
Making check in buildsystems/autotools
make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/buildsystems/autotools'
make[1]: Nothing to be done for 'check'.
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/buildsystems/autotools'
Making check in buildsystems/cmake
make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/buildsystems/cmake'
make[1]: Nothing to be done for 'check'.
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/buildsystems/cmake'
Making check in help
make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/help'
make[2]: Entering directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/help'
make[2]: Nothing to be done for 'check-am'.
make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/help'
make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/help'
Making check in tests
make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/tests'
make[2]: Entering directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/tests'
make  check-TESTS
make[3]: Entering directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/tests'
make[4]: Entering directory '/tmp/arch/spack-stage/spack-stage-gtk-doc-1.32-ssf2zpr367hwpi6im2m5ot6brs2oebr5/spack-src/tests'
PASS: check.py
```
